description: A grease fire ignited during Monster Jam at the Georgia Dome Saturday night, officials say.
title: Grease fire ignites at Georgia Dome during Monster Jam
title_page: Grease fire ignites at Georgia Dome during Monster Jam
text:
A grease fire ignited during Monster Jam at the Georgia Dome Saturday night, officials say.
The fire started at one of the concession stands, spokesman Jason Kirksey said.
The sprinkler system put the fire out before firefighters arrived on the scene and no injuries were reported, Kirksey said.
The show continued without interruption, though some people were relocated from their seats because of the presence of smoke in the area.
The Monster Jam event was being held as one of the last public events at the Georgia Dome.
In other news:
